meanings.sent1: The movie had an inspirational message that made everyone feel hopeful.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was so inspirational that it motivated the entire audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to climb the tree was inspirational, even though it failed.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise painted an inspirational picture in the sky, filling everyone with awe.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's words were truly inspirational, leaving a lasting impact on the students.

meanings.definition: Arousing feelings of inspiration or motivation
meanings.sent1: The painting had an inspirational effect on the viewers, sparking creativity.
meanings.sent2: The coach's pep talk was so inspirational that the team won the game.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's determination to find nuts was inspirational, even though it kept getting lost.
meanings.sent4: The mountain view was an inspirational sight, making one feel small yet empowered.
meanings.sent5: The music had an inspirational melody that touched the hearts of all who listened.
